About Me

Hi, I'm Mark Lester Cruz

A creative worker with a variety of skills and a passion for Web Design and Web Development. I have a broad skill set that includes graphic design, video editing, autoCad design, UI/UX design, and front-end web development, and I bring a special combination of technical skills and creativity to every project I work on.
